data.text: @BDUTT She needs your money, now that she stopped getting any from her other sources.

@BDUTT Got my copy! Can’t put it down…don’t think there will be any better reportage of India’s collective lived experience through this pandemic! Fearless and relentless Barkha has done it again! https://t.co/2SMIpqodCx
@samtamittal @BDUTT Does anyone has courage to write against China who is mother of this decease? No. Because he has bought these writers.

@BDUTT Rs 537 puray 550 kar daty.
Koi pagal hi hoga jo khariday ga
Ghosh is trying to sell her book for one year.
Dhanda hi bna liya hai.
@BDUTT Looking at the cover itself I can say it's going to be a propeganda for sure.
@BDUTT At least now you should know that  KARMA fallows , try to go to temple and stop provoking people against their own and stop your one sided secularism.
@samtamittal am sending you so much love and strength and for once when I say I know how you feel its absolutely true. Thank you for sharing. And reading my book
